title: Create legal industry production example and documentation
description:
**As a** legal tech developer
**I want** complete production example for legal industry deployment
**So that** I can deploy Consoul for law firms with best practices

**Context:**
First production deployment: workers' compensation attorneys analyzing case files. Need complete example showing:
- Document analysis (depositions, medical records)
- Tool filtering (no bash/filesystem access)
- Compliance logging
- Multi-user isolation

Combine all EPIC-016 and EPIC-017 features into working legal tech template.

**Technical Notes:**
- Create: examples/legal/ directory
- Create: examples/legal/server.py (production server)
- Create: examples/legal/config.yaml (legal-specific config)
- Create: examples/legal/README.md (deployment guide)
- Create: examples/legal/docker-compose.yml
- Dependencies: All features from EPIC-016/017
- Integration: Document processing, tool filtering, audit logging

Example workflows:
1. Case file analysis (upload PDF, extract text, AI analysis)
2. Legal research (web search only, no code execution)
3. Document comparison (multiple PDFs)
4. Deposition summarization

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** legal industry example deployed
**When** attorney uploads case file PDF
**Then** extracts text and provides AI analysis

**Given** tool filtering configured
**When** AI attempts bash/file operations
**Then** blocked with audit log entry

**Given** multi-user deployment
**When** different attorneys use system
**Then** sessions remain completely isolated

**Given** compliance audit needed
**When** reviewing logs
**Then** can trace all AI actions to specific users

**Testing Considerations:**
- Manual testing with sample legal PDFs
- Test tool filtering blocks dangerous tools
- Test audit log completeness
- Verify session isolation
- Test with multiple concurrent users
- Review compliance log format

**Implementation Hints:**
- Server config: Disable bash_execute, file_edit tools
- Enable: web_search, analyze_text, document processing
- Tool filter: {"allow": ["web_search", "extract_pdf_text", "analyze_text"]}
- Audit logging: Enable for all tool executions
- Session management: Redis for production
- Document examples/legal/workflows.md with use cases
- Add examples/legal/sample_case_analysis.py
- Include docker-compose with Redis + Consoul server
- Environment variables: LEGAL_MODE=true
- Reference: SOUL-292 (tool filtering), SOUL-293 (document processing)
- Reference: SOUL-295 (audit logging), SOUL-297 (HTTP endpoint)
